title: Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, right margin: D Marot invente et fecit auec preuillege des États generaux des province Vnies
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Rounded painted ceiling in trompe l’oeil, depicting figures on clouds in the sky. Garlands surround it, including several putti with different symbols in the corners. At the top and bottom, flanking the central design, a roundel between two cartouches decorated with putti.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-44.
